price: Que crêem no Invisível e cumprem a oração e despendem, do que lhes damos por sustento
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
